shapecode_3_g2=1.000
shapecode_3_b2=0.000
shapecode_3_a2=0.000
shapecode_3_border_r=1.000
shapecode_3_border_g=1.000
shapecode_3_border_b=1.000
shapecode_3_border_a=0.100
per_frame_1=q1=.1*sin(time*.52)+cos(time*.13);
per_frame_2=q2=.1*sin(time*.61)+cos(time*.23);
per_frame_3=q3=.06*cos(time*.14)+sin(time*.05);
per_frame_4=q4=.055*cos(time*.13)+sin(time*.16);
warp_1=`shader_body
warp_2=`{
warp_3=`    // sample previous frame
warp_4=`    ret = tex2D( sampler_main, uv ).xyz;
warp_5=`    
warp_6=`    // darken (decay) over time
warp_7=`    ret *= .9-.08; //or try: ret -= 0.004;
warp_8=`}
comp_1=`shader_body
comp_2=`{
comp_3=`ret=1;
comp_4=`float sample = tex2D(sampler_main, uv);
comp_5=`float x = 0;
comp_6=`float y = 0;
comp_7=`float ret1 = 0;
comp_8=`float ret2 = 0;
comp_9=`float2 uvb = 0;
comp_10=`float3 uvd = 0;
comp_11=`float blum = 0;
comp_12=`
comp_13=`uvd-=GetBlur2(uv);
comp_14=`uvd.x*=1-tex2D(sampler_noise_hq, uv.x);
comp_15=`uvd.y*=1-tex2D(sampler_noise_hq, uv.y);
comp_16=`
comp_17=`uvd.x*=q4;
comp_18=`uvd.y*=q3;
comp_19=`
comp_20=`uvd.xy*=aspect.xy;
comp_21=`
comp_22=`uvb.x=.5-.250*tex2D(sampler_noise_hq, uv.x+q3);
comp_23=`uvb.y=.5-.250*tex2D(sampler_noise_hq, uv.y-q4);
comp_24=`uvb*=aspect.xy;
comp_25=`
comp_26=`uvb.x*=q3;
comp_27=`uvb.y*=q4;
comp_28=`
comp_29=`float3 background = (tex2D(sampler_noise_hq, uvb)+tex2D(sampler_noise_hq, uvb));
comp_30=`blum = 32*(background)+GetBlur1(background);
comp_31=`
comp_32=`float3 detail = tex2D(sampler_main, uvd);
comp_33=`background*=detail*blum;
comp_34=`
comp_35=`float color = float3(1,1,1);
comp_36=`ret*=background;
comp_37=`}
